sentences.sentence: Even though many times before, you never did escape the maddening abysm.
sentences.translation: 尽管此前多次，你从未真正走出这狂乱的深渊。

sentences.sentence: As I can no longer feel the other end of the abysm, conscientiously I shall arise form the dullish darkness.
sentences.translation: 如今再也无法触摸到深渊的另一端，于是在一片浑黑之中便要自觉上升了。
